title: Magix Samplitude Music Studio v20.0.2.16 MultiLang Full - Tracer
description:
SAMPLITUDE MUSIC STUDIO V20.0.2.16 FULL
LANGUAGE......: Multilang (en)
OS..........: Win-All  x86x64 <a href="
http://www.magix.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.magix.com</a>







                                                 
Samplitude Music Studio 2014 combines all the studio tools needed for professional music production.At home, in the rehearsal room, or in your project studio: no matter where you are you'll have everything you need to let your creativity flow and make your own hit songs it's really simple and easy to use!It's all right there  multitrack recording, precise audio editing, sound design, mixing with effects, virtual instruments, mastering, and publishing...


more - details: <a href="
http://www.magix.com/gb/samplitude-music-studio" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.magix.com/gb/samplitude-music-studio</a>



UPDATE - CHANGE-LOG:

20.0.2.16

-playback problems with some ASIO drivers -fixed
-various crash fixes
-problems with Vita instruments on some localized Windows versions ( e.g. russian Windows XP )
-hardware controller: missing AUX and EQ update when switching tracks -fixed

20.0.0.14
-Various crash fixes -after activation of MAGIX plugin demos and restart of the program they can now be found under "VST FX" instead "More Effects
-Vintage Organ: better performance

20.0.0.12
-High memory usage Electric Piano -fixed



Supported operating systems

For Microsoft Windows XP | Vista | 7 | 8

   Processor: Intel Pentium or AMD Athlon 1.5 GHz or higher
   RAM: 1 GB (2 GB recommended)
   Graphics card: Onboard graphics card with a screen resolution of at least 1024 x 768
   Sound card: Internal sound card (ASIO-enabled sound card recommended)
   Hard disk space: 4.3 GB free disk space for program installation
   Optical drive: DVD drive (only for installation of the box version)
   Internet connection: An Internet connection is required to activate the software

Optional:

   Burn: Burn CDs/DVDs with CD/DVD+/-R(W) recorder
   MP3 export: with Windows Media Player 10 or higher

Note: The program's internal online services and the online update require an Internet connection.
Supported file formats

   Import/Export: WAV with codec, MP3, CD-A, OGG Vorbis, AIFF, FLAC
   Import: MIDI standard formats (MID, GM, GS, XG), WAV (24 & 32-bit)
   Export: MIDI standard formats (MID), WAV (24-bit)





ADDITIONAL RELEASE NOTES

ABOUT MULTILANGUAGE

The Precracked Update from inside this Release is "Multilanguage", so if you want the same as here in your Language , you can use the Update ONLY from HERE, with the "Samplitude Music Studio" in your Language
(If you New: You can get the Main-Version in all available languages as a Trial @ MAGIX))



NOTICE ABOUT THE PRECRACKED UPDATE INSIDE THE RELEASE

if you already have installed a earlier "Samplitude Music Studio" version on you PC, you don't need to install the included Mainversion.
Click directly on "2. UPDATE to Version 20.0.2.16" in the Installer!

If you got an Error at the Update Installation's end: DON'T Worry, all is proper here, you get this message from Magix only because the Installer try to update Vita Electric PianoVita Vintage Organ and it seems you don't have installed one or both Instruments YET you can simply downloadinstall this ones later, if all is done!



ABOUT COMING ONLINE UPDATES WITH THIS RELEASE

If "Music Studio" informs you about a new UPDATE, start the 32BIT executable of "Music Studio" and go to the Menu:
"HELPAUTO UPDATE",
the Reg-Window appears -> just click on "Register immediately online" and follow the coming Update-Installer Steps from Magix.
if all is done:
Restart "Music-Studio" and have Fun! (Both updated Versions (32&64 Bit) are still activated now)


ABOUT THE INSTRUMENTS & SOUNDS DOWNLOADS

Simply Install what you like, i've tested any available additional

Download: menuDownload Instruments and Sounds and all works fine here! ...
if you a registered magix-user (eg. the Soundpool-Addon for Music-Studio or the Vintage-Organ Instr.)
Inside you found also the MAGIX-Pro Plugin Bundle, who needs to be purchased as usual!

if you want Download and use it FULL in "Samplitude Music Studio":
Use "Protein-Activator" in the Installer for this Plugz (Just read the message after apply this button, if wanted)

Notice: If you also use "Samplitude Pro X Suite": dont get worry, you have to use still the embedded ones instead of the new installed VST-FX, wich appears now twice...)




INSTALL NOTES

APPLY THE "Music Studio Installer.exe" AS ADMIN AND:

1. Install Samplitude Music Studio (!also 32BIT!), if done:

Close and directly UPDATE to the latest, pre-cracked & included Version: 20.0.2.16 -
[NOW YOU DONT MUST! BUT,YOU CAN DO]

2. ...  : Turn Off your Internet - Connection, the "Activator" works both, ON or OFFLINE!( You Decide )

3. Start the "MusicStudio.exe" (!! 32BIT - The Reg-Window appears
(Fake-SN input is not needed this time, just add a fake-Mail into the text box (if the entry is empty).

Now simply agree with a CLICK on "Register immediately online"
[If a Nag-MSG about your "Inet-Connection's Off-State" pop's up: bypass it simply with a click on: "Ignore"]

a (more or less) Success-Window appears now!
[Dont worry or take care of the included Text -> ALL is Exact as it should be here!] -> just agree this with a click on "OK"

All related get's activated and Music-Studio Restart now regged!
Finally Re-Turn ON your Internet-Connection and use "Samplitude Music Studio" (The 64BIT Executables are NOW also activated!)
